trends: There have been no other sightings in Sea Girt
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailswell, i am a gamer, a person who plays games alot. and one evening i was playing video games, modern warfare 2 to be exact. and i thought i saw a really big plane, because i have a window that is close to the direction alot of planes come in, because i live close to alair airport. i thought it was a stealth bomber, but then i realized, stealth bombers are more huge that that thing, and the make so much noise.so i walked over to the window to see a triangular shape w\ lights that flew in a straight flight path, then stopped. it hovered over one of my neighbors yards, the blasted off into like hyperspace. i literally had to change my pants i was so scared. i didn't lose sight of the object, it flew up in the sky, fast as light speed.
